name: Ice Age Village
about:
Embark on a fun and frozen journey through the Ice Age universe. In his hunt for his favourite acorn, across the frozen lands, Scrat has accidently cracked the Earth's crust.
Help build a new home for cute animals like raccoons, sharks, monkeys, dinosaurs and many more animals, too. Don't forget about Sid, Manny & Diego -- plus that nutty little animal, Scrat, of course.

Enjoy the unique world of Ice Age, inspired by your favourite family-fun Ice Age films and featuring Sid, Manny, Diego & Scrat.

Build a new home across vast frozen plains for the entire Ice Age family and discover over 200 cute new animals.

Explore Dino World with lovable dinosaurs to bring home.
Play mini-games like Kung Fu Scrat & Sid's Egg Rescue. Participate in fun events in your bustling Village.

Visit your friends' Villages and see who can build the best village.
Join these Sub-Zero Heroes in their noble quest to reunite the Herd and every animal and dinosaur family today.
____________________

You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by deciding to watch certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN.
In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never.
Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.
This game contains advertising for Gameloft’s products or some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device’s ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the Internet.
________________________

Visit our official site at http://www.gameloft.com
Follow us on Twitter at http://glft.co/GameloftonTwitter or like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/Gameloft to get more info about all our upcoming titles.

name: XÓC ĐĨA-Bản Deluxe
about:
SOCKS is a very popular and loved game in Vietnam.
Do you enjoy playing folk dice games?
Are you troubled by the fact that you don't know what to play on the weekend?
Don't worry, download and experience the game XOC DOC-Deluxe Version online，unlock both XOC DOC and Bau Cua games at once.

How to play SOCKER
- Start the turn, choose your bet.
- Bet at will.
- Open the trophy and announce the results.
- If the dice match the bet, you get the bonus.
- Otherwise, you will lose all your bets.

HIGHLIGHTS:
- All free.
- Suitable for all ages.
- Beautiful and colorful interface.
- Cross-eyed effects, along with enchanting sounds.
- We also include Bau Cua games with realistic gameplay！

A selection of folk and traditional games that are very popular during the holidays. Quickly download XOC DISK-Deluxe Edition and join the fun and relaxing game.

Note: This is a fun entertaining mobile game, any win or lose in the game does not mean you will win in the real gambling game.

name: Domination Wars
about:
Enjoy tiny huge battles and dominate the enemy. Set up your strategy deck, chop some wood, build your barracks and raise an army in this fast paced RTS!

COLLECT RESOURCES
Use peons to collect some magical wood and build up your village. Wood is the key to winning!

DESIGN YOUR DEFENSES
Create your own island, place your defense buidlings and select which hero will protect the kingdom!

FIGHT AGAINST PLAYER'S ISLANDS
Fight against tons of unique handcrafted island, created by other players. Climb the ladder and get awesome rewards!

UNIQUE TROOPS AND SPELLS
Archers, barbarians, trolls, rogues, dragons, demons, knights... Unlock them all to build the best army ever.

HANDCRAFTED MAPS FOR THE OFFLINE MODE
Maps for the solo battles have been designed manually so you can enjoy a unique experience as you play!

This is just the beginning of your game and we are willing to add many more game modes and unique features. If you have any suggestion to make, we are happy to get any feedback from you.

Your army is waiting for your orders, my lord!

A brand new Discord server is available at https://discord.gg/Fvw8qjFGM7

name: Chess Online - Clash of Kings
about:
Chess is a smart entertainment for children and adults. Play chess online with people from around the world and develop logical thinking.

The most important features of our Chess application:

- The Chess application is free
-
-
- of difficulty
- with hundreds of and piles of gold to collect
- are available to show the most advantageous moves
- , you can use this option in the case of a mistake
- presents your personal score
- helps you to progress.


!
Crave for ? This is a great option for 2 players! Play with friends online or face people from all over the world in an online chess duel. Decide which online option suits you best.
Do you miss your friends and evenings having fun together?

Add friends in the app and invite a friend to the game.
Remember to share your thoughts in the in-app chat!


Try your hand at Blitz ARENA tournaments!
Sign up for tournaments in advance by clicking the *Join* button, and when the tournament starts, tap *Start playing* and compete!
All you have to do is to win as many games as possible and grab royal prizes, e.g., gorgeous avatars! You will find your results in the leaderboard of the ongoing tournament and the monthly tournament ranking.


Check your progress with ELO Rating. This is the rating system that assesses your skill level in playing chess. Moreover, it allows you to observe scores and the history of your results.
Curious about how to improve your tactics? Game Analysis allows you to look over your gameplay. This feature points out the moves you should avoid in the future and the ones you should stick to.

When you don't want to play a full game mode, solve chess puzzles. Move to a distant land, earn gold by moving with the chess Knight, and explore further levels with hundreds of puzzles. Each square on the board contains a chess puzzle you must solve to move on. Chess puzzles are quick tasks where you checkmate your opponent in a limited number of moves.


Chess for beginners, for children, or perhaps for a master? Everyone will find a level suitable for their chess skills. Choose from 10 different difficulty levels, train, and
Our Chess application gives sheer pleasure as standard gameplay with a friend or playing online.
Playing our Chess app also entertains, educates children, and develops their intellectual skills.

Have you made a mistake or want to try another tactic? No problem. Use the button and win!

If you need a hint on your next move, use the Move the piece to the highlighted field to defeat the opponent. The Hints will help you learn the most successful game strategies. They are great for beginners and more experienced chess players.


Benjamin Franklin mentioned prevention, prudence, and foresight as some of them. Playing chess has plenty of advantages. Children who regularly play chess increase their IQ level. Such benefits of playing chess also apply to adults and older people.
Chess is famous worldwide - the Portuguese and Brazilians play xadrez, the French play échecs, and the Spanish choose ajedrez.
Ready for a chess clash? Play chess online with friends!

name: Battle Ranker in Another World
about:
You were about to be surrounded and killed by a gang, but were taken to another world just in time.
In an unknown space, the beautiful MC. Jenny Pink offers you a choice.

Return home by taking part in a battle in Otherworld, or die!
Will you choose death, or will you choose to fight?

You decide to fight, vowing for vengeance.




Idle RPG with quick advancements! Level up and grow even when idling!
Feel the joy of progress without the hassle!😊


Jenny Pink will support your progress throughout the battles in Otherworld.
Level up Jenny and enjoy life with her in Otherworld.😍


Communicate and compete with other users summoned to this world!
There can only be one winner! Be the top ranker in Otherworld!👍


The battle has already started. Check out your powers through PvP with other users!


Glamorous, captivating monsters are waiting for you in the dungeon!😱


The only thing you need to do is enjoy!
